response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it could be worth even more to you. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a significant advantage while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this extraordinary deal.", "product_price": 950000}
